name: Firework Birthday Simulator
description:
Fireworks Birthday Simulator - a game simulator joke where you can play with fireworks as a phone for his birthday! The game uses animation and sound for a more realistic effect! Use our secure on holiday fireworks and celebration birthday or anniversary will take place great!
Meet the holiday with firecrackers fun!
Make fun and play your friends and loved ones!
ATTENTION! This simulation game designed for entertainment and jokes, as well as fun, it is completely safe and will not harm or anyone!
Thank you for playing our applications! Leave us feedback and we will try to make our apps even better!
